about_the_game:
Are you eager to scare your friends and family? Accompanied by your fellow recorder and an old white blanket, your dreams can now come true! Introducing the all-new Flute Master "Trick or Treat" DLC pack with 3 new tracks for your recorder! Trick-or-Treating will never be the same! Terrify your neighbourhood while walking from door to door. Frighten innocent bystanders and make sure they never leave their homes again! Or you can just petrify your parents by waking them up with these sweet tunes. It's up to you!


Featuring 3 new Halloween tracks:

- Catch the Ghost
- Spooky Mike
- Vlady Party

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)
detailed_description:
Are you eager to scare your friends and family? Accompanied by your fellow recorder and an old white blanket, your dreams can now come true! Introducing the all-new Flute Master "Trick or Treat" DLC pack with 3 new tracks for your recorder! Trick-or-Treating will never be the same! Terrify your neighbourhood while walking from door to door. Frighten innocent bystanders and make sure they never leave their homes again! Or you can just petrify your parents by waking them up with these sweet tunes. It's up to you!


Featuring 3 new Halloween tracks:

- Catch the Ghost
- Spooky Mike
- Vlady Party

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

short_description: Flute Master "Trick or Treat" DLC pack features 3 new original songs Catch the Ghost, Spooky Mike and Vlady Party. Prepare that fright with your recorder.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
